td.content: s:patient presents with Body Aches x 5 weeks. he is a 58 year old m. describes drinking an average of 12 beers a week for about 2 years in his past smokes 1 pack/day o:Height 68 in, Weight 115 lbs, Temperature 98.2 F, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 103, DiastolicBP 62, Respiration 15 a:Lyme Disease p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to rheumatology.

s:a 58 year old white M instructor presents with Body Aches for 11 days. pt has a 1 pack per day habit he consumes 2 drinks per night o:Height 68 in, Weight 116 lbs, Temperature 98.3 F, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 65, Respiration 16 a:Lyme Disease p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered B burgdorferi IgG Serum.

s:pt complains of recurrent Body Aches over the past month. he is a 60 yo white male. he smokes one pack/day of cigarettes describes drinking an average of 12 beers a week for about 3 years in his past o:Height 68 in, Weight 116 lbs, Temperature 97.9 F, Pulse 85, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 65, Respiration 16, B burgdorferi IgM CSF positive a:Lyme Disease p:administered amoxicillin/calvulanate - 875 mg 2x day, performed B burgdorferi IgM CSF, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.
Do not IV Fluid and Support
